verses.verse: A Psalm of David. <S%H1732><s%> Fret <S%H2734><s%> not yourself because of evildoers, <S%H7489><s%> neither <S%H408><s%> be you envious <S%H7065><s%> against the workers <S%H6213><s%> of iniquity. <S%H5766><s%>
For they shall soon <S%H4120><s%> be cut <S%H5243><s%> down <S%H5243><s%> like the grass, <S%H2682><s%> and wither <S%H5034><s%> as the green <S%H3418><s%> herb. <S%H1877><s%>

Trust <S%H982><s%> in the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> good; <S%H2896><s%> so shall you dwell <S%H7931><s%> in the land, <S%H776><s%> and truly <S%H530><s%> you shall be fed. <S%H7462><s%>
Delight <S%H6026><s%> yourself also in the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> and he shall give <S%H5414><s%> you the desires <S%H4862><s%> of your heart. <S%H3820><s%>
Commit <S%H1556><s%> your way <S%H1870><s%> to the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> trust <S%H982><s%> also in him; and he shall bring <S%H6213><s%> it to pass. <S%H6213><s%>
And he shall bring <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> your righteousness <S%H6664><s%> as the light, <S%H216><s%> and your judgment <S%H4941><s%> as the noonday. <S%H6672><s%>

Rest <S%H1826><s%> in the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and wait <S%H2342><s%> patiently <S%H2342><s%> for him: fret <S%H2734><s%> not yourself because of him who prospers <S%H6743><s%> in his way, <S%H1870><s%> because of the man <S%H376><s%> who brings <S%H6213><s%> wicked <S%H4209><s%> devices <S%H4209><s%> to pass. <S%H6213><s%>
Cease <S%H7503><s%> from anger, <S%H639><s%> and forsake <S%H5800><s%> wrath: <S%H2534><s%> fret <S%H2734><s%> not yourself in any wise to do evil. <S%H7489><s%>
For evildoers <S%H7489><s%> shall be cut <S%H3772><s%> off: but those that wait <S%H6960><s%> on the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> they shall inherit <S%H3423><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>

For yet <S%H5750><s%> a little <S%H4592><s%> while, and the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall not be: yes, you shall diligently <S%H995><s%> consider <S%H995><s%> his place, <S%H4725><s%> and it shall not be.
But the meek <S%H6035><s%> shall inherit <S%H3423><s%> the earth; <S%H776><s%> and shall delight <S%H6026><s%> themselves in the abundance <S%H7230><s%> of peace. <S%H7965><s%>
The wicked <S%H7563><s%> plots <S%H2161><s%> against the just, <S%H6662><s%> and gnashes <S%H2786><s%> on him with his teeth. <S%H8127><s%>
The LORD <S%H136><s%> shall laugh <S%H7832><s%> at him: for he sees <S%H7200><s%> that his day <S%H3117><s%> is coming. <S%H935><s%>

The wicked <S%H7563><s%> have drawn <S%H6605><s%> out the sword, <S%H2719><s%> and have bent <S%H1869><s%> their bow, <S%H7198><s%> to cast <S%H5307><s%> down <S%H5307><s%> the poor <S%H6041><s%> and needy, <S%H34><s%> and to slay <S%H2873><s%> such as be of upright <S%H3477><s%> conversation. <S%H1870><s%>
Their sword <S%H2719><s%> shall enter <S%H935><s%> into their own heart, <S%H3820><s%> and their bows <S%H7198><s%> shall be broken. <S%H7665><s%>
A little <S%H4592><s%> that a righteous <S%H6662><s%> man has is better <S%H2896><s%> than the riches <S%H1995><s%> of many <S%H7227><s%> wicked. <S%H7563><s%>
For the arms <S%H2220><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall be broken: <S%H7665><s%> but the LORD <S%H3068><s%> upholds <S%H5564><s%> the righteous. <S%H6662><s%>
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> knows <S%H3045><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of the upright: <S%H8549><s%> and their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> shall be for ever. <S%H5769><s%>
They shall not be ashamed <S%H954><s%> in the evil <S%H7451><s%> time: <S%H6256><s%> and in the days <S%H3117><s%> of famine <S%H7459><s%> they shall be satisfied. <S%H7646><s%>

But the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall perish, <S%H6><s%> and the enemies <S%H341><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall be as the fat <S%H3368><s%> of lambs: <S%H3733><s%> they shall consume; <S%H3615><s%> into smoke <S%H6227><s%> shall they consume <S%H3615><s%> away.
The wicked <S%H7563><s%> borrows, <S%H3867><s%> and pays <S%H7999><s%> not again: <S%H7999><s%> but the righteous <S%H6662><s%> shows mercy, <S%H2603><s%> and gives. <S%H5414><s%>
For such as be blessed <S%H1288><s%> of him shall inherit <S%H3423><s%> the earth; <S%H776><s%> and they that be cursed <S%H7043><s%> of him shall be cut <S%H3772><s%> off.
The steps <S%H4703><s%> of a good man <S%H1397><s%> are ordered <S%H3559><s%> by the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> and he delights <S%H2654><s%> in his way. <S%H1870><s%>
Though <S%H3588><s%> he fall, <S%H5307><s%> he shall not be utterly cast <S%H2904><s%> down: <S%H2904><s%> for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> upholds <S%H5564><s%> him with his hand. <S%H3027><s%>

I have been <S%H1961><s%> young, <S%H5288><s%> and now am old; <S%H2204><s%> yet have I not seen <S%H7200><s%> the righteous <S%H6662><s%> forsaken, <S%H5800><s%> nor his seed <S%H2233><s%> begging <S%H1245><s%> bread. <S%H3899><s%>
He is ever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%> merciful, <S%H2603><s%> and lends; <S%H3867><s%> and his seed <S%H2233><s%> is blessed. <S%H1293><s%>
Depart <S%H5493><s%> from evil, <S%H7451><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> good; <S%H2896><s%> and dwell <S%H7931><s%> for ever more. <S%H5769><s%>

For the LORD <S%H3068><s%> loves <S%H157><s%> judgment, <S%H4941><s%> and forsakes <S%H5800><s%> not his saints; <S%H2623><s%> they are preserved <S%H8104><s%> for ever: <S%H5769><s%> but the seed <S%H2233><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall be cut <S%H3772><s%> off.
The righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall inherit <S%H3423><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> and dwell <S%H7931><s%> therein <S%H5921><s%> for ever. <S%H5703><s%>
The mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> speaks <S%H1897><s%> wisdom, <S%H2451><s%> and his tongue <S%H3956><s%> talks <S%H1696><s%> of judgment. <S%H4941><s%>
The law <S%H8451><s%> of his God <S%H430><s%> is in his heart; <S%H3820><s%> none <S%H3808><s%> of his steps <S%H838><s%> shall slide. <S%H4571><s%>
The wicked <S%H7563><s%> watches <S%H6822><s%> the righteous, <S%H6662><s%> and seeks <S%H1245><s%> to slay <S%H4191><s%> him.
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> will not leave <S%H5800><s%> him in his hand, <S%H3027><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> condemn <S%H7561><s%> him when he is judged. <S%H8199><s%>

Wait <S%H6960><s%> on the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and keep <S%H8104><s%> his way, <S%H1870><s%> and he shall exalt <S%H7311><s%> you to inherit <S%H3423><s%> the land: <S%H776><s%> when the wicked <S%H7563><s%> are cut <S%H3772><s%> off, you shall see <S%H7200><s%> it.
I have seen <S%H7200><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%> in great power, <S%H6184><s%> and spreading <S%H6168><s%> himself like a green <S%H7488><s%> bay <S%H249><s%> tree.
Yet he passed <S%H5674><s%> away, and, see, <S%H2009><s%> he was not: yes, I sought <S%H1245><s%> him, but he could not be found. <S%H4672><s%>
Mark <S%H8104><s%> the perfect <S%H8535><s%> man, and behold <S%H7200><s%> the upright: <S%H3477><s%> for the end <S%H319><s%> of that man <S%H376><s%> is peace. <S%H7965><s%>
But the transgressors <S%H6586><s%> shall be destroyed <S%H8045><s%> together: <S%H3162><s%> the end <S%H319><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall be cut <S%H3772><s%> off.
But the salvation <S%H8668><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> is of the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> he is their strength <S%H4581><s%> in the time <S%H6256><s%> of trouble. <S%H6869><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall help <S%H5826><s%> them, and deliver <S%H6403><s%> them: he shall deliver <S%H6403><s%> them from the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> and save <S%H3467><s%> them, because <S%H3588><s%> they trust <S%H2620><s%> in him.
